name: Disc Fortress (alpha v0.2)
description:
Alpha Build v0.2

Made for the Disc Room Game Jam

WASD - Move

Left Click - Throw disc

Throw discs to kill zombies and make walls. But don't touch said discs or walls of discs. Or zombies. 

I wanted to release to get it out for feedback and eyeballs. I will update and polish over the coming week before the jam ends.

Release Log

  • Alpha v0.2: Visual polish, reworked throwing mechanic, added placeholder sounds and first pass of music, changed spelling of “disk” to “disc” to better fit the theme (except for the game title in game 😬)
  • Alpha v0.1: First release of game with core idea and mechanic in place 

Planned Content for Jam Release

  • Timer and local high scores
  • Blood, and blood trails, and lots of BLOOD
  • Longer music
  • Weapon pickups (shotgun saws, shuriken, chainsaws, other saws?)

Made in GameMaker 1.4; music made in Medly.

Game and music by me, sound effects provided by Doseone
